name: Find The Key (Eddysss)
description:
The grass blocks the passage, you have to find the key to open the door.

it is a linear horror themed adventure, between skeletons and giant aliens the gameplay is basically walking and running, strange things happen along the way (lol) .. there are two endings, it lasts about 50 minutes.

it's my first game, i developed it myself using unreal engine 5 with a gtx 1060 6gb and 16gb ram, but you can decrease the graphics settings if needed.

I recommend using the controller for the vibration functions, available languages English and Italian.

the game is free, enjoy!

Eddysss
